txt.en: This mark is awarded to those fighting in the Naillan campaign, mainly for completing encounters. This campaign consists of Ford of Bruinen, Strike Against Dannenglor and Protectors of Thang√∫lhad.\n\nThese can be redeemed for cosmetic rewards at various Skirmish vendors, or redeemed for Skirmish Marks at the Skirmish Exchange vendor.
